Deathly Glare.name: Deathly Glare
Deathly Glare.flavor: Your vision of your foe’s corpse forces itself on reality, withering your victim rapidly.
keywords: Personal   Effect: Make an attack with one of your 1st-level at-will attack powers that targets only one creature. If that attack hits its target, choose one of the following effects:
Deathly Glare.effect:
Make an attack with one of your 1st-level at-will attack powers that targets only one creature. If that attack hits its target, choose one of the following effects:
The attack deals 2d10 extra damage.
The target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Visions of Death.name: Visions of Death
Visions of Death.flavor: You show your foe its own death, while forcing new vulnerabilities upon it.
Visions of Death.effect: Make an attack with one of your 1st-level at-will attack powers that targets only one creature. That attack deals 3d10 extra psychic damage. If your attack misses, the target takes half damage. Regardless of whether the attack hits, the target gains vulnerable 10 to all damage (save ends).

Foretold Death.name: Foretold Death
Foretold Death.flavor: Having seen your enemy’s death, you react swiftly when it comes.
keywords: Personal   Trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you drops to 0 hit points.  Effect: You move your speed, shift 1 square, or stand up from being prone.
Foretold Death.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you drops to 0 hit points.
Foretold Death.effect: You move your speed, shift 1 square, or stand up from being prone.
